name: Scooby-Doo and a Mummy, Too!
summary: When the Egyptian exhibit at the university falls under the attack of one of its own exhibits, someone needs to step in and save the day. The Mystery Gang is on the job in another confounding conundrum, and you're here to help them out. One of the mummies has mysteriously reanimated and is doing his best to stop everyone in their tracks. Help these meddling kids while keeping an eye out for the toilet-paper tyrant — one look and he'll turn you into stone. Get on the case and dig up some concrete evidence to put this villain away.Scooby-Doo and a Mummy Too lands you in the middle of a heart-pumping adventure. Employ your reading skills to help the Mystery Gang save the day.
